line_1: If gloomy thought the human mind o'erpower,
line_2: But should kind Spring her wonted bounty shower,

line_1: The gen'ral's arms as far the king's o'erpow'r,
line_2: As this new structure does surpass the bow'r.

line_1: Can their light tales your weighty griefs o'erpower,
line_2: Or glad with airy mirth the toilsome hour?

line_1: Consuming flames will soon thy strength o'erpower,
line_2: Such passions mingle with each bitter shower!

line_1: When Death's dread horrors shall each sense o'erpower;
line_2: Yet think an hour shall come, nor far that hour,
